name: TheAtlantic
text:
A mental health crisis is looming as the American West burns.

Many wildfire survivors told @jdkstern13 they felt "haunted" and "disturbed" by the recurring fires. "As irrational as they knew it was, they felt as though the fires were stalking them." https://t.co/61G8mlPSbC

name: TheAtlantic
text: It's common for people in middle age to feel spiritual stirrings, even if they've been nonreligious for some time. @arthurbrooks writes that this change in identity can be scaryâ€”but with faith or anything else, it's healthy to let ourselves change: https://t.co/qgge11vMWd
